languages.text: "Конкретно сейчас — вряд ли. Нам предстоит заняться грязной рутинной работой — прочесыванием когитаторных логов и допросами населения станции, включая не самых благонадежных личностей. Все это не стоит времени Вольного Торговца, поверьте. Однако, если обстоятельства переменятся, я определенно хотел бы заручиться помощью такого надежного союзника, как вы".

"Right at this moment, unlikely. We have a considerable amount of dirty and routine work ahead of us, such as checking cogitator logs and questioning the station's residents, including its less palatable individuals. None of that is worth the Rogue Trader's time, I assure you. Still, should circumstances change, I will absolutely welcome the aid of such a dependable ally as yourself."
languages.original_text: "Конкретно сейчас — вряд ли. Нам предстоит заняться грязной рутинной работой — прочесыванием когитаторных логов и допросами населения станции, включая не самых благонадежных личностей. Все это не стоит времени Вольного Торговца, поверьте. Однако, если обстоятельства переменятся, я определенно хотел бы заручиться помощью такого надежного союзника, как вы".

None of that is worth the Rogue Trader's time, I assure you. Still, should circumstances change, I will absolutely welcome the aid of such a dependable ally."

languages.text: 「現時点では、ありそうにありません。私たちには膨大な量の面倒で日常的な仕事が控えており、考算機のログ確認や、あまり好ましくない住人も含めてステーションの住民への聞き取り調査などがあります。それらにはローグトレーダーの時間を割く価値はないと断言します。それでも、状況が変われば、あなたのような信頼できる味方の助力は間違いなく歓迎いたします」
languages.original_text: "Right at this moment, unlikely. We have a considerable amount of dirty and routine work ahead of us, such as checking cogitator logs and questioning the station's residents, including its less palatable individuals. None of that is worth the Rogue Trader's time, I assure you. Still, should circumstances change, I will absolutely welcome the aid of such a dependable ally as yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「現時点では、ありそうにありません。私たちには膨大な量の面倒で日常的な仕事が控えており、考算機のログ確認や、あまり好ましくない住人も含めてステーションの住民への聞き取り調査などがあります。それらにはローグトレーダーの時間を割く価値はないと断言します。それでも、状況が変われば、あなたのような信頼できる味方の助力は間違いなく歓迎いたします」

languages.text: "Şu anda sanmıyorum. Elimizde kavramsayar kayıtlarını kontrol etmek ve istasyon sakinlerini sorgulamak gibi çok sayıda pis ve rutin iş var. Bunların hiçbiri, Hür Tacir'in vaktini almaya değmez. Durum değişecek olursa sizin gibi güvenilir bir müttefikin yardımını almayı karşılayacağıma emin olabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Right at this moment, unlikely. We have a considerable amount of dirty and routine work ahead of us, such as checking cogitator logs and questioning the station's residents, including its less palatable individuals. None of that is worth the Rogue Trader's time, I assure you. Still, should circumstances change, I will absolutely welcome the aid of such a dependable ally as yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Şu anda sanmıyorum. Elimizde kavramsayar kayıtlarını kontrol etmek ve istasyon sakinlerini sorgulamak gibi çok sayıda pis ve rutin iş var. Bunların hiçbiri, Hür Tacir'in vaktini almaya değmez. Durum değişecek olursa sizin gibi güvenilir bir müttefikin yardımını almayı karşılayacağıma emin olabilirsiniz."

languages.text: «Ahora mismo, no lo creo. Tenemos mucho trabajo sucio y rutinario por delante, incluyendo leer registros de cogitador e interrogar a los habitantes de la estación, incluyendo los más ruines. Nada que merezca el tiempo de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, se lo aseguro. Sin embargo, si las circunstancias cambian, recibiré con mucho gusto el apoyo de un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a} tan fiable como usted».
languages.original_text: "Right at this moment, unlikely. We have a considerable amount of dirty and routine work ahead of us, such as checking cogitator logs and questioning the station's residents, including its less palatable individuals. None of that is worth the Rogue Trader's time, I assure you. Still, should circumstances change, I will absolutely welcome the aid of such a dependable ally as yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora mismo, no lo creo. Tenemos mucho trabajo sucio y rutinario por delante, incluyendo leer registros de cogitador e interrogar a los habitantes de la estación, incluyendo los más ruines. Nada que merezca el tiempo de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, se lo aseguro. Sin embargo, si las circunstancias cambian, recibiré con mucho gusto el apoyo de un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a} tan fiable como usted».

languages.text: “目前看来可能不太需要。我们还有很多常规工作要做，也有很多脏活要干，比如检查沉思者的日志，询问这座星站的居民，包括那些不怎么招人喜欢的家伙。我可以向你保证，这些事情不值得行商浪人浪费时间。不过，如果情况有变，我会非常欢迎你的援助，毕竟你是位非常可靠的盟友。”
languages.original_text: "Right at this moment, unlikely. We have a considerable amount of dirty and routine work ahead of us, such as checking cogitator logs and questioning the station's residents, including its less palatable individuals. None of that is worth the Rogue Trader's time, I assure you. Still, should circumstances change, I will absolutely welcome the aid of such a dependable ally as yourself."

traits.locale_text: “目前看来可能不太需要。我们还有很多常规工作要做，也有很多脏活要干，比如检查沉思者的日志，询问这座星站的居民，包括那些不怎么招人喜欢的家伙。我可以向你保证，这些事情不值得行商浪人浪费时间。不过，如果情况有变，我会非常欢迎你的援助，毕竟你是位非常可靠的盟友。”

languages.text: "Im Moment eher nicht. Wir haben einige unerfreuliche Routinearbeiten wie die Überprüfung der Cogitatorenprotokolle und die Befragung der Bewohner der Station vor uns ... von denen einige eher unangenehm sind. Nichts davon ist Eurer Zeit würdig, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, das versichere ich Euch. Sollten sich die Umstände ändern, wäre ich für jede Hilfe {mf|eines|einer} so verlässlichen Verbündeten aber natürlich ausgesprochen dankbar."
languages.original_text: "Right at this moment, unlikely. We have a considerable amount of dirty and routine work ahead of us, such as checking cogitator logs and questioning the station's residents, including its less palatable individuals. None of that is worth the Rogue Trader's time, I assure you. Still, should circumstances change, I will absolutely welcome the aid of such a dependable ally as yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Im Moment eher nicht. Wir haben einige unerfreuliche Routinearbeiten wie die Überprüfung der Cogitatorenprotokolle und die Befragung der Bewohner der Station vor uns ... von denen einige eher unangenehm sind. Nichts davon ist Eurer Zeit würdig, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, das versichere ich Euch. Sollten sich die Umstände ändern, wäre ich für jede Hilfe {mf|eines|einer} so verlässlichen Verbündeten aber natürlich ausgesprochen dankbar."

languages.text: « Pour le moment, je ne crois pas. Il nous reste beaucoup de travail ingrat à accomplir : consulter les journaux des cogitateurs et interroger les résidents de la station, y compris les moins recommandables. Tout ceci est indigne {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande}. Cependant, si la situation venait à évoluer, l'aide d'{mf|un allié|d'une alliée} fiable comme vous serait très appréciée. »
languages.original_text: "Right at this moment, unlikely. We have a considerable amount of dirty and routine work ahead of us, such as checking cogitator logs and questioning the station's residents, including its less palatable individuals. None of that is worth the Rogue Trader's time, I assure you. Still, should circumstances change, I will absolutely welcome the aid of such a dependable ally as yourself."
